content.prompt: The Proclamation Line of 1763 was designed to

choices.label: establish a defensible boundary between the British and the French colonists along the Appalachian Mountains
divide western territories into future royal colonies
restrict British immigration to the North American colonies
create more taxable income for the royal government by selling western territories

topic.text: 3.2: Seven Years' War (The French and Indian War)

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
